truly a love letter to boomer shooters  if you are at all a fan of such games this is a must play the episodes are varied in their theme weapons feel nice and strong and upgrading them is a nice incentive to explore  while i had some problems with optimisation on a descent rig perhaps you wont anyhow its not a deal breaker however elevators in certain levels tend to knock you out of the map so be careful  overall a lovely experience for any fan of the genre
